text:
Note that the down-move factor is the reciprocal of the up-move factor, and the
probability of an up-move is one minus the probability of a down-move. The one-period
binomial tree for the stock is shown in Figure 2. The beginning stock value of $30 is
to the left, and to the right are the two possible end-of-period stock values, $40.00 and
$22.50.
